summary: Craftable Amulet. Adds a permanent Ghost effect and 15% on all resistances.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m just getting in to using the creation kit, hoping to eventually have a crafting-related quest up and loaded. Right now, I thought I\'d mess with effects, and this is the result: An amulet that gives the \'ghost\' effect.

Using 2 \'philter of the phantom\' potions, and the Skyforge, the amulet is craftable without any prior perks needed. On top of the ghost effect, it adds water breathing and 15% to all resistances.

I wanted it to be something you could use if you enjoyed, along with it benefitting gameplay. 

Tested on Master Difficulty... and still felt over-powered.



Let me know what would make this balanced (as it\'s clearly not), and if there are any other \'effects\' (like ghost) you\'d like to see, and I\'ll see if I can get them to work in-game.

!UPDATE! - BUG WARNING:

Scratch that earlier update.

Permanently transparent effect, even with the amulet removed.

Confirmed Fix: Try spawning a philter of the phantom and then drinking it.
author: johnwalker60
